QuestData.Title: Hozen Love Their Keys
QuestData.Description: The hozen have a yeti! They call it Old Poot Poot and keep it at the back of their cave.$b$bHozen are normally scared of yeti, but now they feed it grummles.$b$bThey have a Hunter Chief, Cho Cho the Wicked. Can you see if he has a key on him to the yeti shackles?$b$bBad fortune for hozen if a yeti is loose in their fort.
QuestData.LogDescription: Get the Yeti Shackle Key from Cho Cho the Wicked and release Old Poot Poot.
QuestData.CompletionText: A luckydo would be wise to never travel near a yeti on a dirty yak.
QuestData.RewardText: Oh wow that looked like one wild ride!
